short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to add items from e-commerce to your shelf.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension helps a registered user of Flatshelf.com to add any item from major e-commerce site to his Flatshelf account. Please refer our FAQs on www.flatshelf.com to better understand usage of this chrome extension.
